title: Deepening Science Principle Learning Through Cognitive Modeling and Intermediate Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics principles (simple machines, force interactions, etc.)
context.additional_context: Program aimed at strengthening science teaching material design competencies for elementary school administrators/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can construct cognitive models solving given pulley problems with 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze peer-generated problems to improve their own cognitive models at least twice
Learners can identify three or more errors in problem-solving processes through metacognitive activities (self-monitoring/reflection)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
